mapper.select: select member_no ,member_grade ,member_id ,member_pwd ,member_name ,nickname ,phone ,email ,address ,pay_account ,email_agree ,status ,enroll_date ,modify_date ,member_origin_name ,member_modify_name ,member_file_path from member left join member_image using(member_no) where member_id = #{memberId} and status = 'N'
select count(*) from member where member_id = #{checkId}
select count(*) from member where nickname = #{checkNick}
select who ,secret ,when from secretcode where who = #{who} and secret = #{secret} and when between sysdate-3/24/60 and sysdate
